balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address

params._owner: address to query the balance of

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Tells whether an operator is approved by a given owner

params._operator: operator address which you want to query the approval of

returns._0: bool whether the given operator is approved by the given owner

params._tokenId: uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of

returns._0: owner address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID

params._from: owner address, _to destination address, _tokenId shirt ID

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Sets or unsets the approval of a given operator An operator is allowed to transfer all tokens of the sender on their behalf

params._approved: representing the status of the approval to be set
params._to: operator address to set the approval

userdoc.notice: This contract is a game where players can create their own cryptshirt The cryptoShirt is an ERC721 Token and it has a name and value initialised at 0 when it is created The value of the cryptoshirt increases when his owner change.
